primevc.mvc.IMVCNotifier

type
interface
implements
primevc.core.traits.IDisablable
primevc.core.traits.IDisposable
The MVCNotifier is an object that can send messages to the mvc-application.

Instance Methods

disable() : Void

Disable sending messages

enable() : Void

Enable sending messages

isDisposed() : Bool

Method returning true if the notifier is disposed

isEnabled() : Bool

Method returning true if the notifier is enabled
